meanings.definition: A patty made from soybeans, typically used as a meat substitute in vegetarian dishes.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious soyburger for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offers a tasty soyburger on their menu.
meanings.sent3: When the soyburger started singing, everyone was surprised.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as satisfying as biting into a juicy soyburger.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the soyburger on the grill filled the air with a tempting aroma.

meanings.definition: To cook or consume a soyburger.
meanings.sent1: I will soyburger the patty for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys soyburgering with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally soyburgered the soybean instead of the beef.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of soyburgering filled the kitchen with a savory smell.
meanings.sent5: Soyburgering together creates a sense of community among vegetarians.
